statements: SELECT * FROM student_mobility_data WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT study_abroad_country, academic_performance_rating FROM student_mobility_data WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM student_mobility_data WHERE career_outcomes_rating > 4;
SELECT program_id, career_outcomes_rating FROM student_mobility_data ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, study_abroad_country, academic_performance_rating FROM student_mobility_data WHERE program_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT student_id, program_id, study_abroad_country FROM student_mobility_data WHERE academic_performance_rating > 80 ORDER BY career_outcomes_rating DESC, student_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM student_mobility_data WHERE study_abroad_country = 'France' OR study_abroad_country = 'Spain' ORDER BY program_id ASC
SELECT student_id, program_id, study_abroad_country, academic_performance_rating, career_outcomes_rating FROM student_mobility_data WHERE program_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_id, program_id, study_abroad_country, academic_performance_rating FROM student_mobility_data GROUP BY program_id HAVING AVG(academic_performance_rating) > 70 ORDER BY student_id DESC

SELECT student_id, program_id, study_abroad_country, academic_performance_rating, career_outcomes_rating FROM student_mobility_data WHERE study_abroad_country LIKE '%merica%' ORDER BY academic_performance_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT student_name, current_program FROM student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mobility_data WHERE semester > 3;
SELECT student_id, academic_performance FROM mobility_data ORDER BY academic_performance DESC;
SELECT student_id, career_outcomes FROM mobility_data ORDER BY career_outcomes ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE current_program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM student WHERE study_abroad_program IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, semester, academic_performance FROM mobility_data WHERE academic_performance = 'Good' AND semester >= 2 ORDER BY semester ASC;
SELECT s.student_id, s.student_name, m.academic_performance FROM student s JOIN mobility_data m ON s.student_id = m.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, country, start_date, end_date FROM study_abroad_programs WHERE country = 'Spain';
SELECT student_id, program_id, gpa FROM student_outcomes WHERE gpa >= 3.5 AND job_placement = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM study_abroad_programs WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT student_id, program_id, gpa FROM student_outcomes WHERE gpa >= 3.5 ORDER BY gpa DESC;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, p.program_name, o.gpa FROM students s JOIN student_outcomes o ON s.student_id = o.student_id JOIN study_abroad_programs p ON o.program_id = p.program_id WHERE o.job_placement = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, gender, dob FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT student_name, study_program FROM Students WHERE home_country = 'USA' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_duration, host_country FROM StudyAbroadPrograms WHERE program_type = 'Exchange';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN CourseGrades ON Students.student_id = CourseGrades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, student_name, gender, dob, home_country, study_program FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE gender='Female' AND study_program='Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, program_name, program_type FROM Students JOIN StudyAbroadPrograms ON Students.study_program = StudyAbroadPrograms.program_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, semester FROM Students JOIN CourseGrades ON Students.student_id = CourseGrades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, job_title, employer, salary FROM Students JOIN CareerOutcomes ON Students.student_id = CareerOutcomes.student_id WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM Students WHERE country='USA';
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT program_name FROM Programs WHERE program_type='Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM Universities ORDER BY university_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT university_name, location FROM Universities WHERE location = 'NY';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT s.student_id, s.name, c.course_name FROM Students s JOIN Student_Enrollment se ON s.student_id = se.student_id JOIN Courses c ON se.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.country = 'Canada';
